jobs.title: Makerbot
jobs.text: Developed patches for 3D printer firmware, and configured the Linux device tree for different peripheral hardware components.

jobs.title: Intuit
jobs.text: Software Engineer on the Technology Exploration team at TurboTax. I worked on technologies involving natural language processing, virtual assistance, support/care, data analysis, and mobile development using a wide variety of programming languages and environments.

jobs.title: RIT CIAS
jobs.text: I work in the IT department for the College of Imaging Arts and Sciences at RIT while I'm at school. The position involves maintaining labs and providing technical support.
